text.section:
The motor vehicles used in the gasohol testing program shall consist of the following:
Four motor vehicles currently in use with the Department of General Services which have been in use for 1 year before the tests begin; and
Four new motor vehicles of the Department of General Services may be used for the test.
The costs of the gasohol testing program shall be paid from funds appropriated in the State budget.
The Legislative Policy Committee shall make a report of its recommendations to the Governor and to the General Assembly no later than January 31, 1980.
